snippet: The interior ministers called on Sunday for other European Union countries to help solve the root causes of the migrant crisis at the port of Calais.
lead_paragraph: The interior ministers called on Sunday for other European Union countries to help solve the root causes of the migrant crisis at the port of Calais.

headline.main: France and Britain Seek Help on Calais Migrants From E.U.
headline.print_headline: France and Britain Seek Help From E.U. on Solving Migrant Crisis at Calais Port

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
